alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 29 at 11:47AM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Utah... East Canyon Creek Near Jeremy Ranch downstream to East Canyon Reservoir affecting Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Back zones. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. For the East Canyon Creek...including Jeremy Ranch downstream to East Canyon Reservoir...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...East Canyon Creek Near Jeremy Ranch downstream to East Canyon Reservoir. * WHEN...From Sunday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.1 feet, minor flooding is expected along East Canyon Creek from Jeremy Ranch downstream to East Canyon Reservoir. Minor inundation is expected at the Jeremy Ranch Golf Course and areas adjacent to the creek downstream. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 6.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late Sunday evening. Peak flows are forecast to occur Monday night into Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.1 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM MDT.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
